name: Document the error
steps: The error and its resolution (if any) will be documented in the `design_principles.json` under the `error_log` section.
path_to_scripting: This step can be implemented as a script that is executed after the error is triaged and reported. The script would take the details of the error and its resolution, and then use the `replace` tool (or a custom script that modifies JSON) to add a new entry to the `agent_error_log` section of the `design_principles.json` file. This ensures that the agent's learning from failures is systematically documented and integrated into its knowledge base.
